contents.name: Audacity
contents.description: open source, cross-platform software for recording and editing sounds.

contents.name: Audiosauna
contents.description: transforms your web browser into a fast and flexible music production studio with built in synthesizers and live effects.

contents.name: Bfxr
contents.description: A tool to make sound effects for computer games.

contents.name: Bosca Ceoil
contents.description: Online (and also desktop) music producer made by Terry Cavanagh. Simple, intuitive, has a distinctive retro-ish sound.

contents.name: FamiTracker
contents.description: free windows tracker for producing music for the NES/Famicom-systems.

contents.name: jfxr
contents.description: A JavaScript port of the Bfxr sound effect generator.

contents.name: MadTracker
contents.description: a powerful and efficient approach to making music. Versatility and compatibility are guaranteed due to full VST™, ASIO™ and ReWire™ support.

contents.name: MilkyTracker
contents.description: open source tracker for Mac/Linux/Windows platforms.

contents.name: musagi
contents.description: open source, fairly large and sophisticated music editor and synthesizer

contents.name: Resemble
contents.description: Resemble's voice cloning engine within Unity

contents.name: SunVox
contents.description: a small, fast and powerful modular synthesizer with pattern-based sequencer (tracker).
